text: Ara tomara upare uthe yacchile ebam pechana dike phire takacchile na karo prati, athaca rasula dakachilena tomadigake tomadera pechana dika theke. Atahpara tomadera upara elo sokera opare soka, yate tomara hata theke beriye ya'oya bastura jan'ya duhkha na kara ebam yara sam'mukhina haccha sejan'ya bimarsa na ha'o. Ara allaha tomadera kajera byapare abahita rayechena.
